actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to prohibit the importation of coal and of certain articles of uranium, if the product of the Union of South Africa.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to prohibit the importation of certain uranium compounds, uranium ore, uranium metal, or coal from South Africa.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to prohibit the importation of coal and of certain articles of uranium, if the product of the Union of South Africa.
